name: Aether Tradewinds
oracle_text: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.
flavor_text:
"The wind smells of misfortune. Check your knots."
—Anitan, Ondu cleric

name: Ajani's Sunstriker
oracle_text: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "Ajani goes where he is needed most and in his name we keep his lands safe."

name: Altar's Reap
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text:
"Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."
—Gorghul, augur of skulls

name: Apex Hawks
oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{W} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Flying
Apex Hawks enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

name: Assassinate
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text:
"This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."
—Yurin, royal assassin

name: Brago's Representative
oracle_text: While voting, you get an additional vote. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)
flavor_text: On Fiora, no matter is settled until King Brago offers an opinion.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text: The mizzium-sphere array drove her mind deep into the thought field, where only the rarest motes of genius may be plucked.

name: Brimstone Volley
oracle_text:
Brimstone Volley deals 3 damage to any target.
Morbid — Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage instead if a creature died this turn.

name: Charging Rhino
oracle_text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text:
"Is it wrong to go straight for what you want? Sneaking is for cats and goblins."
—Tahngarth of the *Weatherlight*

name: Chartooth Cougar
oracle_text:
{R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Cinder Wall
oracle_text:
Defender
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
flavor_text:
"The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."
—Onean sergeant

name: Cogwork Librarian
oracle_text:
Draft Cogwork Librarian face up.
As you draft a card, you may draft an additional card from that booster pack. If you do, put Cogwork Librarian into that booster pack.
flavor_text: Why wait for answers?

name: Cogwork Spy
oracle_text:
Reveal Cogwork Spy as you draft it. You may look at the next card drafted from this booster pack.
Flying
flavor_text: Paliano's creations provide ample opportunities to plot the downfall of a neighbor.

name: Compulsive Research
oracle_text: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.
flavor_text: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

name: Copperhorn Scout
oracle_text: Whenever Copperhorn Scout attacks, untap each other creature you control.
flavor_text: Fangren spur may sound louder, but Viridian resurgents claim that the horn of the vorrac creates a truer, more inspiring note.

name: Courier Hawk
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance
flavor_text: The Orzhov started using hawks as messengers in order to bypass the many toll roads and bridges that dot Ravnica. Soon the service became one of their most profitable businesses.

name: Crookclaw Transmuter
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Crookclaw Transmuter enters the battlefield, switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Custodi Squire
oracle_text:
Flying
Will of the council — When Custodi Squire enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.

name: Doomed Traveler
oracle_text: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

name: Dream Fracture
oracle_text:
Counter target spell. Its controller draws a card.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Creation is a paradox. It hatches from its opposite."
—Olka, Mistmeadow witch

name: Echoing Courage
oracle_text: Target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A single seed unleashes a flurry of growth.

name: Elvish Aberration
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.
Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Enclave Elite
oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
Enclave Elite enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

name: Enraged Revolutionary
oracle_text: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: When every right is voted away, only rage remains.

name: Flowstone Blade
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."
—Karn

name: Gnarlid Pack
oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{G} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Gnarlid Pack enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

name: Grenzo's Cutthroat
oracle_text:
First strike
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: "Their guards are soft, ready to welcome a sharp dagger."

name: Grixis Illusionist
oracle_text: {T}: Target land you control becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It's simple, really. If they can't find us, they can't kill us."

name: Grudge Keeper
oracle_text: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you didn't vote for loses 2 life.
flavor_text: "Your defiance is noted."

name: Guardian Zendikon
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a 2/6 white Wall creature with defender. It's still a land.
When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

name: Howling Wolf
oracle_text: When Howling Wolf enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to three cards named Howling Wolf, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Hunger of the Howlpack
oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Morbid — Put three +1/+1 counters on that creature instead if a creature died this turn.
flavor_text:
"Werewolves are an unholy mix of a predator's instinct and a human's hatred."
—Alena, trapper of Kessig

name: Infectious Horror
oracle_text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.

name: Kor Chant
oracle_text: All damage that would be dealt this turn to target creature you control by a source of your choice is dealt to another target creature instead.
flavor_text: Sacred rites repurposed to fight an ancient threat.

name: Liliana's Specter
oracle_text:
Flying
When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing."
—Liliana Vess

name: Lizard Warrior
flavor_text: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.

name: Lurking Automaton
oracle_text:
Reveal Lurking Automaton as you draft it and note how many cards you've drafted this draft round, including Lurking Automaton.
Lurking Automaton enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the highest number you noted for cards named Lurking Automaton.

name: Mana Geyser
oracle_text: Add {R} for each tapped land your opponents control.
flavor_text: The Quicksilver Sea hissed and bubbled at the indignity. The Vulshok shaman just smiled.

name: Marchesa's Emissary
oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavor_text: "The Black Rose doesn't tolerate weeds."

name: Minamo Scrollkeeper
oracle_text:
Defender
Your maximum hand size is increased by one.
flavor_text: The scrollkeepers never stepped an inch away from the doors of the Great Library, not even when the ogres and their oni masters swept through Minamo.

name: Moment of Heroism
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

name: Nature's Claim
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all."
—Sildark, artificer of Omu

name: Necromantic Thirst
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Noble Templar
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Orcish Cannonade
oracle_text:
Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Crispy! Scarback! Load another volcano-ball."
—Stumphobbler Thuj, orcish captain

name: Pillarfield Ox
flavor_text:
"May starving fleas birth a thousand generations on your stubborn hide, cow!"
—Bruse Tarl, Goma Fada nomad

name: Pitchburn Devils
oracle_text: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

name: Plated Seastrider
flavor_text: The Neurok buried entangling cables just under the Quicksilver Sea. One seastrider harvest can provide an army's worth of armor and shields.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Let nothing own the skies but the wind."
—Dejara, Giltwood druid

name: Power of Fire
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor_text: The cinders believe their flame was stolen by one they call the Extinguisher. All who now wield fire draw their desperate wrath.

name: Pride Guardian
oracle_text:
Defender
Whenever Pride Guardian blocks, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "Any hotheaded cub can raise a sword in anger."

name: Provoke
oracle_text:
Untap target creature you don't control. That creature blocks this turn if able.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Never start a fight you can't finish."
—Padril, council guardian

name: Quag Vampires
oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{B} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Quag Vampires enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

name: Reckless Scholar
oracle_text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.
flavor_text: "Any good prospector must sift the gold from the sand."

name: Respite
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. You gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
flavor_text: "If they board us we're finished," warned Orim. Crovax nodded. "And if they don't . . . what then?"

name: Rousing of Souls
oracle_text: Parley — Each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. Then each player draws a card.
flavor_text: "We remember. We rise."

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
oracle_text: Sacrifice Sakura-Tribe Elder: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

name: Scaled Wurm
flavor_text: The wurms become so big, a single scale can be used as a roof for a human dwelling.

name: Screaming Seahawk
oracle_text:
Flying
When Screaming Seahawk enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Screaming Seahawk, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Selvala's Enforcer
oracle_text: Parley — When Selvala's Enforcer enters the battlefield, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each nonland card revealed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Selvala's Enforcer. Then each player draws a card.

name: Shoreline Ranger
oracle_text:
Flying
Islandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Silverchase Fox
oracle_text: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Silverchase Fox: Exile target enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Be careful in your hunt. The clever little creature can steal your wards and lead you right into the werewolf's den."
—Britta, midwife of Gatstaf

name: Skitter of Lizards
oracle_text:
Multikicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Haste
Skitter of Lizards enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each time it was kicked.

name: Sporecap Spider
oracle_text: Reach
flavor_text:
"They don't move much, but then again, if you get caught in its web, it has all the time in the world to get to you."
—Saidah, Joraga hunter

name: Stasis Cell
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
{3}{U}: Attach Stasis Cell to target creature.
flavor_text: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.

name: Stave Off
oracle_text: Target creature gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Just a moment of perfect grace and sanctity is enough."
—Kal Lior, leonin elder

name: Stronghold Discipline
oracle_text: Each player loses 1 life for each creature they control.
flavor_text: In Urborg, the instigators of each new rebellion are soaked in the blood of the last.

name: Syphon Soul
oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

name: Torch Fiend
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.
flavor_text: Devils redecorate every room with fire.

name: Tragic Slip
oracle_text:
Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
Morbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
flavor_text: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.

name: Traveler's Cloak
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, choose a land type.
When Traveler's Cloak enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has landwalk of the chosen type. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

name: Trumpet Blast
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack. They need signals to tell them when to stop.

name: Turn the Tide
oracle_text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius."
—Varil, Neurok partisan

name: Twisted Abomination
oracle_text:
{B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination.
Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

name: Typhoid Rats
oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.

name: Tyrant's Choice
oracle_text: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for death or torture. If death gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If torture gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent loses 4 life.

name: Unhallowed Pact
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.

name: Valor Made Real
oracle_text: Target creature can block any number of creatures this turn.
flavor_text: "As my father taught, 'Training will raise your shield to the blow, but courage fills the gaps the shield leaves open.'"

name: Vent Sentinel
oracle_text:
Defender
{1}{R}, {T}: Vent Sentinel deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of creatures you control with defender.
flavor_text:
"Zendikar fortifies itself against the Great Threat, making sentries of sky, sea, and stone."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Wakedancer
oracle_text: Morbid — When Wakedancer enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavor_text: Hers is an ancient form of necromancy, steeped in shamanic trance and ritual that few skaberen or ghoulcallers comprehend.

name: Whispergear Sneak
oracle_text:
Draft Whispergear Sneak face up.
During the draft, you may turn Whispergear Sneak face down. If you do, look at any unopened booster pack in the draft or any booster pack not being looked at by another player.
flavor_text: Spy for today. Plan for tomorrow.

name: Wrap in Flames
oracle_text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed."
—*The War Diaries*

name: Wrap in Vigor
oracle_text: Regenerate each creature you control.
flavor_text: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.

name: Zombie Goliath
flavor_text:
"Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord
